articles.title: Mojang officially adds shaders to Minecraft Bedrock Edition - Dexerto
articles.description: Mojang has officially added shaders to Minecraft Bedrock Edition for players who do not use an RTX graphics-powered device.
articles.content: In the most recent update, Mojang has added official shaders to the Minecraft Bedrock edition. The long-awaited feature eliminates the need for shader mods to improve Minecrafts world textures. Here … [+2796 chars]

articles.title: Human DNA controllable with electricity, scientists claim - Interesting Engineering
articles.description: Scientists showed human genes are controllable with electricity, paving the way toward wearable devices that program genes to perform medical interventions
articles.content: Electrogenetic interfaces that would enable electronic devices to control gene expression remain the missing link in the path to full compatibility and interoperability of the electronic and genetic … [+1090 chars]
